column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Kourtney - Thank you for the top-shelf review! I'm very glad to know you have enjoyed your multiple visits
column2: and as I've mentioned in other reviews
column3: it's folks like yourself that keep us chugging along at a steady clip. In return
column4: we will continue to work hard to maintain the quality you have come to expect from us. Thank you very much for the kind words and we look forward to serving you again soon!
